title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Web-Based Training for Cultivating Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) Nursing Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and understanding of digestive system disorders
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain the etiology, symptoms, and diagnostic criteria of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) with over 80% accuracy
Apply necessary pharmacotherapy and nursing interventions for IBD patient management to real cases
Achieve over 20% improvement in pre-post assessment scores after completing the e-learning module
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
